name: part_001
file: tmp_【#ぺこーら24SpecialLive】3D LIVE!!!! 最後は歌って踊って盛り上がるぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [1J1JG99KKCk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora performs the song 'Renai Nou'.
Instrumental transition between songs with a focus on stage visuals.
Short transition to the MC segment.
MC section where Usada Pekora talks to the audience before the guest segment.

subtitles.original: 恋愛脳
subtitles.english: Renai Nou

subtitles.original: 1, 2, 1, 2, 3 君が好きだよ
subtitles.english: 1, 2, 1, 2, 3, I love you.

subtitles.original: 過剰中毒でなおいとおし
subtitles.english: Overly addicted, even more lovely

subtitles.original: 君にファンファーレ 愛ノウ
subtitles.english: Fanfare for you, I know love

subtitles.original: ずっとファンファーレしたい 恋愛脳
subtitles.english: I want to keep playing fanfare, Love-Brain

subtitles.original: 待って、これはまだ
subtitles.english: Wait, this is still...

subtitles.original: なんて言ってもほら
subtitles.english: Saying whatever, look...

subtitles.original: だって表面じゃまだ
subtitles.english: Because on the surface, still...

subtitles.original: 葛藤は重度のご愛嬌
subtitles.english: Conflict is a severe charm

subtitles.original: 無敵の笑顔で荒らすメディア
subtitles.english: A media storm with an invincible smile

subtitles.original: アイドル
subtitles.english: Idol

subtitles.original: 知りたいその秘密ミステリアス
subtitles.english: Wanna know her secret, mysterious

subtitles.original: 抜けてるところさえ彼女のエリア
subtitles.english: Even her flaws are part of her area

subtitles.original: 完璧で嘘つきな君は
subtitles.english: Perfect and a liar, you are

subtitles.original: 天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: A genius idol-sama

subtitles.original:
アイドル
作詞・作曲：Ayase
subtitles.english:
Idol
Lyrics/Composition: Ayase

subtitles.original: 今日何食べた？好きな本は？
subtitles.english: What did you eat today? What's your favorite book?

subtitles.original: 遊びに行くならどこに行くの？
subtitles.english: Where would you go for fun?

subtitles.original: 何も食べてない、それは内緒
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten anything, that's a secret

subtitles.original: 何を惹かれても、のらりくらり
subtitles.english: Being elusive no matter what's asked

subtitles.original: そう淡々と、だけど燦々と
subtitles.english: So coolly, yet brilliantly

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない密は蜜の味
subtitles.english: Appearing but hidden, the secret is the taste of honey

subtitles.original: あれもないないない、これもないないない
subtitles.english: Not that, not that, not this, not this

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？相手は？さあ答えて
subtitles.english: What's your type? Who's the one? Come on, answer me

subtitles.original: 「誰かを好きになることなんて私分からなくてさ」
subtitles.english: "I don't really know about falling in love with someone"

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ない
subtitles.english: Whether it's a lie or truth, no one can know

subtitles.original: そんな言葉に、また一人堕ちる
subtitles.english: With those words, another one falls

subtitles.original: また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: Making them love me again

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく
subtitles.english: Everyone's eyes are being stolen away

subtitles.original: 君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: You are the perfect and ultimate idol

subtitles.original: 金輪際現れない
subtitles.english: Never to appear again

subtitles.original: 一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: Reincarnation of the brightest star

subtitles.original: その笑顔で愛してるで
subtitles.english: With that smile and "I love you"

subtitles.original: 誰も彼もを虜にしていく
subtitles.english: Captivating everyone and anyone

subtitles.original: その瞳が、その言葉が
subtitles.english: Those eyes, those words

subtitles.original: 嘘でもそれは完全な愛
subtitles.english: Even if it's a lie, it's perfect love

subtitles.original: はいはいあの子は特別です
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that girl is special

subtitles.original: 我々は端からおまけです
subtitles.english: We are just extras from the start

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Bです
subtitles.english: We are supporting role B for the star

subtitles.original: すべてがあの子のおかげなわけない
subtitles.english: There's no way everything is thanks to her

subtitles.original: 洒落臭い、妬み嫉妬なんてないわけがない
subtitles.english: Annoying, there's no way there isn't envy and jealousy

subtitles.original: これはネタじゃないからこそ許せない
subtitles.english: Because this isn't a joke, I can't forgive

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃない君じゃ許せない、自分を許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive you who isn't perfect, I can't forgive myself

subtitles.original: 誰よりも強い君以外は認めない
subtitles.english: I won't acknowledge anyone but you, who is stronger than anyone

subtitles.original: 誰もが信じあがめてる
subtitles.english: Everyone believes and worships

subtitles.original: まさに最強で無敵のアイドル
subtitles.english: Truly the strongest and invincible idol

subtitles.original: 弱点なんて見当たらない
subtitles.english: No weaknesses can be found

subtitles.original: 一番星を宿している
subtitles.english: Carrying the brightest star

subtitles.original: 弱いとこなんて見せちゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: Mustn't show any weak points, no, no

subtitles.original: 知りたくないとこは見せずに
subtitles.english: Without showing things people don't want to know

subtitles.original: 唯一無二じゃなくちゃイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: It has to be one and only, no, no

subtitles.original: それこそ本物の愛
subtitles.english: That is true love

subtitles.original: 得意の笑顔で沸かすメディア
subtitles.english: Stirring up the media with her specialty smile

subtitles.original: 隠しきるこの秘密だけは
subtitles.english: Only this secret must be kept hidden

subtitles.original: 愛してるって嘘で積むキャリア
subtitles.english: Building a career on "I love you" lies

subtitles.original: これこそ私なりの愛だ
subtitles.english: This is my own kind of love

subtitles.original: 流れる汗も綺麗なアクア
subtitles.english: Even the flowing sweat is beautiful aqua

subtitles.original: ルビーを隠したこの瞼
subtitles.english: These eyelids that hide rubies

subtitles.original: 歌い踊り舞う私はマリア
subtitles.english: I who sing and dance am Maria

subtitles.original: そう嘘はとびきりの愛だ
subtitles.english: Yes, lies are an exceptional kind of love

subtitles.original: 誰かに愛されたことも、誰かのこと愛したことも
subtitles.english: Having never been loved by someone, or having never loved someone

subtitles.original: ないそんな私の嘘が、いつか本当になること
subtitles.english: Such lies of mine, that they will one day come true

subtitles.original: 信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe

subtitles.original: いつかきっと全部手に入れる
subtitles.english: One day I'll surely get it all

subtitles.original: 私はそう欲張りなアイドル
subtitles.english: I am such a greedy idol

subtitles.original: 等身大でみんなのこと、ちゃんと愛したいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to love everyone properly, at full scale

subtitles.original: 今日も嘘をつくの
subtitles.english: I lie again today

subtitles.original: この言葉がいつか本当になる日を願って
subtitles.english: Praying for the day these words one day come true

subtitles.original: それでもまだ君と君にだけは言えずにいたけど
subtitles.english: But still, I hadn't been able to say it only to you and you

subtitles.original: あ、やっと言えた
subtitles.english: Ah, I finally said it

subtitles.original: これは絶対嘘じゃない、愛してる
subtitles.english: This is definitely not a lie, I love you

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: まずは、恋愛脳そしてアイドルの2曲歌わせてもらったぺこ！
subtitles.english: First, I sang two songs: Renai Nou and Idol, peko!

subtitles.original: どうぺこだったかなー？
subtitles.english: How was it, peko?

subtitles.original: ちゃんと歌えて踊れてましたぺこでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Was I able to sing and dance properly, peko?

subtitles.original: そしてみんなのお楽しみ、ゲストパートこのあとすぐぺこ！
subtitles.english: And everyone's looking forward to it, the guest part is coming right up, peko!

subtitles.original: どんな曲が聞けるかお楽しみにね！
subtitles.english: Look forward to hearing what kind of songs!

subtitles.original: ってなわけでぺこーらは行ってきまーす！
subtitles.english: So, Pekora is heading off!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!
